p: Recently, one article has highlighted the importance of distinguishing between two different overlapping disease phases. The first phase is normally induced by the virus while the second is the result of host physiological response. In order to help with treatment decision, Siddiqi et al., proposed in their article three clinical stage classification for COVID-19 patients [ 8]. In light of pathogenesis and proposed clinical classification, this reviewâ€™s purpose is to summarize and simplify the most important updates on the management and the potential treatment of this emergent disease.
